title: Data Scientist
description_bullets:
- Participation in Data Science projects:

1. Built an unsupervised classification model (kmeans) for identifying clusters in the salesforce (using tidy and broom from R), collaborate in the development of a PowerBI dashboard for sales area.
2. Built a Classification model through decision tree executed with Spark using sparklyr. The fitted model with its pipelines are saved for futures predictions.
3. Contribution in the construction of training y testing bases (Using SQL) for a recommendation model.
- R, Sparklyr, Python, SQL, Databricks, Microsoft Azure, Tidymodels, PowerBI
